text: Winston Bryant (born October 3, 1938) is an American politician and attorney. He was the Secretary of State of Arkansas (1977–1978), the 14th Lieutenant Governor of Arkansas (1981–1991) and Arkansas Attorney General (1991–1999). ==References== Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Lieutenant Governors of Arkansas Category:Lawyers from Arkansas Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Winston Bryant
